trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Lanille looks expectantly into the woods, as if waiting for someone.
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_TODO_00<tab>Search for Lanille's niece.
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_TODO_01<tab>/pray before the sacred tree.
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_TODO_02<tab>Report to Lanille.
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_LANILLE_000_001<tab>Gods...that girl never listens...!? Oh! It is you. How much of my grumbling did you hear?

TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_LANILLE_000_002<tab>An elder's torment knows no end. I sent my niece out to gather branches for a bow, but she has yet to return. Knowing her pious nature, doubtless she is lost in prayer under some tree or the other.

TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_LANILLE_000_003<tab>While I would never deny her her faith, she must learn not to neglect her worldly duties. My warnings fall on deaf ears, however. Perhaps you can succeed where I failed. Could you speak with her on my behalf? She is likely somewhere in the Wild Fete.
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_LANILLE_000_004<tab>I am at my wit's end, so I must ask for your help. Pray find my niece at the Wild Fete and instruct her to return here at once.
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_PRAYERFULVIIS03462_000_010<tab>...
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_PRAYERFULVIIS03462_000_011<tab>Oh, my apologies, I did not notice you. It is so easy to become lost in my quiet of the wood...
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_PRAYERFULVIIS03462_000_012<tab>What? Lanille sent you? I see... It seems I must apologize for becoming your burden as well.

TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_PRAYERFULVIIS03462_000_013<tab>However, it would have been remiss of me to return without saying my proper benedictions. After all, a branch is but a gift of the wood, a piece of its life force that we must be grateful for.

TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_PRAYERFULVIIS03462_000_014<tab>This tree is said to be blessed by Yx'Maja, goddess of beauty and the hunt. It is only natural that I should say thanks here before receiving the wood's bounty.
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_PRAYERFULVIIS03462_000_015<tab>Would you care to join me? Ask for the tree's protection, that you might be safeguarded from danger in the journey ahead.

TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_PRAYERFULVIIS03462_000_016<tab>Who knows what perils you may face in the future? <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Pray<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> for the blessing of the goddess to set your mind at ease.
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_SYSTEM_000_015<tab>The wood is waiting to give its blessing to any who would <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>pray<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> for it.
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_PRAYERFULVIIS03462_000_020<tab>Very good. Now the goddess shall watch over your every step.
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_PRAYERFULVIIS03462_000_021<tab>Now, I suppose it is time I seek out a suitable branch. Please tell Lanille that I shall be home soon.
TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_LANILLE_000_030<tab>You have returned. I hope she did not prove too troublesome.

TEXT_LUCKZF003_03462_LANILLE_000_031<tab>So, even a warrior such as you can be convinced to say a humble prayer? Perhaps there is power in her conviction after all. Very well, I too shall pray that the goddess keeps you in good health.
